  • Method Details

    • find

      public static java.util.Optional<org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature> find​(org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature linestringFeature, org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature oppositeDirectionFeature, org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection collectionToSelect, double maximumDistance)
      Find an object in the collection collectionToSelect in a direction perpendicular to bound (a LineString object) in a direction opposite to parcel
      Parameters:
      linestringFeature - feature containing the line for which a perpendicular line is drawn
      oppositeDirectionFeature - feature containing the geometry used to not draw line in that direction
      collectionToSelect - collection of segment to search for
      maximumDistance - distance till which the algorithm is looking for a road segment
      Returns:
      a perpendicular parcel

    • find

      public static java.util.Optional<org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature> find​(org.locationtech.jts.geom.LineString linestring, org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry oppositeDirection, org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection collectionToSelect, double maximumDistance)
      Find an object in the collection collectionToSelect in a direction perpendicular to bound (a LineString object) in a direction opposite to parcel.
      Parameters:
      linestring - draw line perpendicular to that geometry
      oppositeDirection - Geometry used to not draw line in that direction
      collectionToSelect - collection of segment to search for
      maximumDistance - distance till which the algorithm is looking for a road segment
      Returns:

    • find

      public static java.util.Optional<org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature> find​(org.locationtech.jts.geom.LineString linestring, org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry oppositeDirection, org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection collectionToSelect, double maximumDistance, java.lang.String attrImportance)
      Find an object in the collection collectionToSelect in a direction perpendicular to bound (a LineString object) in a direction opposite to parcel.
      Parameters:
      linestring - draw line perpendicular to that geometry
      oppositeDirection - Geometry used to not draw line in that direction
      collectionToSelect - collection of segment to search for
      maximumDistance - distance till which the algorithm is looking for a segment
      attrImportance - road attribute setting the road importance. Can be null
      Returns:
      The closest or most important segment
